ProductInfo.Features:
19" professional grade 3D metal frame LCD video monitor with over 600 TVL Resolution; 1280 x 1024.
Robust all metal frame and tempered glass; Built-in two stereo speakers.
Digital HDMI/analog composite & VGA video input and 2 looping BNC inputs; NTSC/PAL/SECAM auto detection.
3D comb filter with de-interlace and noise reduction; 50,000 Hour Rated Lifespan.
Remote control, audio cable and VGA cable included; Certification: Energy Star, FCC, CE and RoHS.
ProductInfo.Name: Security Monitor 19-Inch Professional 3D Metal Frame Color LCD Audio Video Display with VGA and Looping BNC Inputs Speakers for CCTV DVR Home Office Surveillance Secure System Black over 600 TVL High Resolution
